name: Team Player
description:
TEAM PLAYER A Game Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

 This game was made by two people over the span of one week for the Brackeys game jam 2021.1. The theme for the game jam was "Stronger Together".
 Play through four levels with your teammate. Kick the ball into the other team's goal to score points and get a teammate boost when you are close enough to your teammate.

 All the art and most of the sound was done in the week for the game jam, and the game was made using the unity game engine.
